original_title: Pink Floyd: Wish You Were Here (Immersion Box Set)
overview: DISC 5 - BLURAY:  - AUDIO: Wish You Were Here, James Guthrie 2009 5.1 Surround Mix (previously unreleased) high resolution audio at 96 kHz/24-bit  - AUDIO: Wish You Were Here, Original stereo mix (1975) mastered in high resolution audio at 96 kHz/24-bit  - AUDIO: Wish You Were Here, 4.0 Quad mix (1975) mastered in high resolution audio at 96 kHz/24-bit  - AUDIO VISUAL: Concert Screen films:  - Shine On You Crazy Diamond Intro  - Shine On You Crazy Diamond  - AUDIO VISUAL: Welcome To The Machine animated clip  - AUDIO VISUAL: Storm Thorgerson short film
title: Pink Floyd: Wish You Were Here (Immersion Box Set)
